title: Goldman Sachs | Associate | Bangalore | Aug '24 offer
content:
Education: BE ( CSE ) Tier 1 college
Years of Experience: 4
Prior Experience: All product based
Previous Compensation: ~28L

Date of the Offers : July '24 / Aug '24
Company : Goldman Sachs
Title/Level : Associate
Location : Bangalore
Salary : 35L
Bonus : 9L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus) : 44L
Benefits : Standard GS benefits
Other details: Had other offers at hand

title: Walmart | SDE 3 | Bangalore OR Target | L4 | Bangalore
content:
Education: BTech (CS) Tier 2 College
Years of Experience: 2.5 Years
Previous CTC : INR 14.1L (Fixed) + 1.6L (Variable)

**Target India**
* Company: Target
* Title/Level: Engineer L4
* Location: Bangalore
* Salary: INR 20,00,000(Fixed Pay)
* Signing Bonus - NA
* Stock bonus: NA
* Variable pay:INR 1,40,000
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock+ Signing Bonus): INR 21,40,000 (total ctc)
* Benefits: Standard target benefits


**Walmart Global Tech**
* Company: Walmart
* Title/Level: SDE 3(equivalent to SDE 2 in other organization)
* Location: Bangalore
* Salary: INR 18,34,000(Fixed Pay)
* Signing Bonus - NA
* Stock bonus: INR 4,37,500(vested over 3 years)
* Variable pay: INR 3,50,000
* Total comp (Salary + Variable pay + Stock+ Signing Bonus): INR 26,21,500 (total ctc)
* Benefits: Standard walmart benefits 
* Note : HR was very strict about the offer and it was non-negotiable.

Which company can be considered?
